mapper.insert: insert into product_tbl(cate_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_discount, pro_publisher, pro_content, pro_up_folder, pro_img, pro_amount, pro_buy) values(#{cate_code}, #{pro_name}, #{pro_price}, #{pro_discount}, #{pro_publisher}, #{pro_content}, #{pro_up_folder}, #{pro_img}, #{pro_amount}, #{pro_buy})
